ViewObject.Name: RentalQuoteLinesVO
ViewObject.SelectList: XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.ACTIVE_FLAG, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.CREATED_BY, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.CREATION_DATE, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.FUEL_OPTION, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.HIRING_BASIS_RULE_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.LINE_NUM, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.LINE_VALUE, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.MARGIN_PERCENTAGE, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.MASTER_QUOTATION_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.MASTER_QUOTE_LINE_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.MIN_CHARGE_UNIT, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.MIN_CHARGE_VALUE, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.MOBILIZATION_REQUIRED, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.OFF_HIRE_DATE, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.ON_HIRE_DATE, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.OPERATOR_OPTION, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.OT1_RATE, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.OT2_RATE, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.PARENT_QUOTATION_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.PARENT_QUOTE_LINE_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.QUANTITY, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.QUOTATION_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.QUOTE_LINE_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.REMARKS, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.RENTAL_TYPE, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.REQUEST_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.REQUEST_LINE_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.REQUEST_LINE_NUM, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.SHIFT, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.STANDARD_RATE, (select ar.REQUEST_NUMBER from xxads_asset_request_t ar where ar.request_id = XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.REQUEST_ID) AS TRANSASSETREQUESTNUM, (select meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t where lookup_type = 'XXADS_RENTAL_TYPE' and application_id = 13 and lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.RENTAL_TYPE) AS TRANSRENTALTYPE, (case when XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.rental_type <> 'O' then (select asset_category from xxads_asset_category_t where category_id=XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) when XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.rental_type = 'O' then (select emp_category_code from xxads_emp_category_t where emp_category_id=XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) end) AS TRANSASSETCATEGORY, (case when XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.rental_type <> 'O' then (select description from xxads_asset_category_t where category_id=XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) when XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.rental_type = 'O' then (select description from xxads_emp_category_t where emp_category_id=XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) end) AS TRANSASSETDESCRIPTION, (select hiring_basis from XXADS_HIRING_BASIS_RULES_T where rule_id=XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.HIRING_BASIS_RULE_ID) AS TRANSHIRINGBASIS, (SELECT XLVT.MEANING FROM XXCUST_LOOKUP_VALUES_T xlvt, XXADS_HIRING_BASIS_RULES_T a where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_FIXED_VARIABLE' and xlvt.lookup_code = a.FIXED_VARIABLE and a.RULE_ID = XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.HIRING_BASIS_RULE_ID AND xlvt.application_id = 13) AS TRANSFIXEDVARIABLE, (case when XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.OPERATOR_OPTION='W' then 'With' else 'Without' end) AS TRANSOPERATOROPTION, (case when XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.FUEL_OPTION='W' then 'With' else 'Without' end) AS TRANSFUELOPTION, (select lookup.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t lookup where lookup.lookup_code = nvl(XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.mobilization_required,'N') and lookup.application_id = 13 and lookup.lookup_type = 'XXADS_YES_NO') AS TRANSMOBILIZATIONREQUIRED, (select meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t where lookup_type = 'XXADS_SHIFT_TYPE' and application_id = 13 and lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.SHIFT) AS TRANSSHIFT, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.BU_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.QUOTATION_ID AS QUOTATION_ID1, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.CUSTOMER_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.PROJECT_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.REQ_BU_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SRC_DIV_FLEX_VAL_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SITE_USE_ID, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type IN ('XXADS_QUOTE_CHARGEABLE_UNITS','XXADS_HIRING_PERIOD_ID') and xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.Min_Charge_Unit and xlvt.application_id = 13) AS TRANSMINCHARGEUNIT, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.UNIT_RATE, (select no_of_days from XXADS_HIRING_BASIS_RULES_T where rule_id=XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.HIRING_BASIS_RULE_ID) AS TRANSNOOFDAYS, (select no_of_hours from XXADS_HIRING_BASIS_RULES_T where rule_id=XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.HIRING_BASIS_RULE_ID) AS TRANSSTANDARDHOURS, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.TAX_RATE_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.TAX_RATE_PERCENT, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.VAT_TAX_AMOUNT, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.TAX_RATE_CODE, XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION

ViewAttribute.Name: TransAssetRequestNum
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select ar.REQUEST_NUMBER from xxads_asset_request_t ar where ar.request_id = XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.REQUEST_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransRentalType
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t where lookup_type = 'XXADS_RENTAL_TYPE' and application_id = 13 and lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.RENTAL_TYPE)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransAssetCategory
ViewAttribute.Expression: (case when XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.rental_type <> 'O' then (select asset_category from xxads_asset_category_t where category_id=XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) when XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.rental_type = 'O' then (select emp_category_code from xxads_emp_category_t where emp_category_id=XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) end)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransAssetDescription
ViewAttribute.Expression: (case when XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.rental_type <> 'O' then (select description from xxads_asset_category_t where category_id=XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) when XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.rental_type = 'O' then (select description from xxads_emp_category_t where emp_category_id=XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) end)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransFixedVariable
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT XLVT.MEANING FROM XXCUST_LOOKUP_VALUES_T xlvt, XXADS_HIRING_BASIS_RULES_T a where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_FIXED_VARIABLE' and xlvt.lookup_code = a.FIXED_VARIABLE and a.RULE_ID = XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.HIRING_BASIS_RULE_ID AND xlvt.application_id = 13)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransMobilizationRequired
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select lookup.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t lookup where lookup.lookup_code = nvl(XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.mobilization_required,'N') and lookup.application_id = 13 and lookup.lookup_type = 'XXADS_YES_NO')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransShift
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t where lookup_type = 'XXADS_SHIFT_TYPE' and application_id = 13 and lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.SHIFT)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransMinChargeUnit
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type IN ('XXADS_QUOTE_CHARGEABLE_UNITS','XXADS_HIRING_PERIOD_ID') and xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteLinesEO.Min_Charge_Unit and xlvt.application_id = 13)
